string.text: Designed for high-quality repairs of army equipment in the field.
Designed for configuration and calibration of army equipment.
Designed for emergency access to military helicopters.

A professional set of tools for fine repairs and modernization of detectors. What is included in the kit is sufficient to do the work required for the setting up and upgrading of any type of detector.
Report folder containing a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover reads: \n 'Merging anomalous rock' \nS/ N 1264

A sticky situation: A group of mercenaries detained one of our agents in the vicinity of Jupiter. There is reason to believe that our agent is still alive. Your goal - the liberation of the agaent and the neutralization of any mercenaries who resist. For safe passage into the camp - use the 'mercenary outfit.' \nTo load data into the PDA - this should be used.
In the letter it says: Major Degtyarev. You need to urgently meet with the liaison. Callsign - 'What's your filet?'.
Halogen lamp and an optical sight, mounted together in a common housing.
Inside the briefcase is a dismantled 'Ruger GP100', as well as a repair kit for it.
Used by the MOE, with a set of universal medical defibrillators.
Unique analog camera with fixed tripod.
A rare drink in the zone.
It is used for communication over large distances. Made in Germany.
Specialized Army binoculars. Included in the equipment given to military snipers.
Another miracle, born within the zone.
Large medical kit. Copes with nearly any injury or bleeding.

This letter contains the following: '... you're the first ones to see me ... I saved your life... in exchange for your silence ... and help. Help me ... I can not appear among the people as I would be shot on sight, They fear me but I know that I must get to the scientists who probably have access to the help I need ...the drug NG-7. Bring me this medication. It will help me. And I will thank you. '\nTo load it's data into the PDA - it should be used.
This letter contains the following: 'Thank you. Now look in the box that is at the end of the corridor. It holds your reward.'
Ozersky said nothing about this drug, but I believe that this drug stops certain mutations.

%c[255,238,153,26] The commander of the auxiliary destination. %c[default] Order - all support groups! Provide support to special forces teams or possibly yourself - to capture, dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G., born in 1978, a native of the town of Pripyat SSR. Signs: lean physique, looking 25-30 years, height - 179 cm, wavy hair, light brown. Wanted, Major SBU. All the objects found with him, immediately deliver to the center. Especially pay attention to the safety of the PDA, paper and electronic media. Five times a reward for the successful execution of the task!

%c[255,238,153,26] The commander of the Special Operations Group. %c[default] Order - all groups of special-purpose! To capture dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G., born in 1978, a native of the town of Pripyat SSR. Signs: lean physique, looking 25-30 years, height - 179 cm, wavy hair, light brown. Wanted, Major SBU. All the objects found with him, immediately deliver to the center. Especially pay attention to the safety of the PDA, paper and electronic media. 10-fold reward for the successful execution of the task!

%c[255,238,153,26] The commander of the Special Operations Group. %c[default] Order - all support groups and special teams! To capture dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G., born in 1978, a native of the town of Pripyat SSR. Signs: lean physique, looking 25-30 years, height - 179 cm, wavy hair, light brown. Wanted, Major SBU. All the objects found with him, immediately deliver to the center. Especially pay attention to the safety of the PDA, paper and electronic media. 15 fold reward for the successful execution of the task!

%c[255,238,153,26] The commander of a special elite unit. %c[default] Order - all groups of a special elite unit! To capture dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G., born in 1978, a native of the town of Pripyat SSR. Signs: lean physique, looking 25-30 years, height - 179 cm, wavy hair, light brown. Wanted, Major SBU. All the objects found with him, immediately deliver to the center. Especially pay attention to the safety of the PDA, paper and electronic media. 20 times a reward for the successful execution of the task!

%c[255,238,153,26] The commander of a special super elite unit. %c[default] Order - all groups over the special elite unit! To capture dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G., born in 1978, a native of the town of Pripyat SSR. Signs: lean physique, looking 25-30 years, height - 179 cm, wavy hair, light brown. Wanted, Major SBU. All the objects found with him, immediately deliver to the center. Especially pay attention to the safety of the PDA, paper and electronic media. 30 fold reward for the successful execution of the task!
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA containing unknown information believed to be of great value.
PDA belonging to the leader of the mercenaries. Information on the PDA: Our password - 'One flew over the cuckoo.'
Case, Taken from the mercenaries by a Monolithian called Leon, He asked me to deliver the case to his Pripyat leader without opening it.

PDA containing a zipped file, the archive is password protected. My PDA does not support this version of the archiver. You need to pass the PDA on to Stormbreaker - perhaps he will be able to extract it's information.
A special weapon to some-one. Made to order, emblazoned on the handle is the inscription, 'Chapa'.
A unique artifact with excellent protective properties. You must take this to the breeder to swap for information you require ... what a shame.
A unique artifact with good protective and restorative properties. However it emits radiation. You will need to pass this artifact on to Krivouhovu.
According to the stalker Pechkin Petka on it's delivery you will get a fee. Recipient - Markovic the banker on the Skadovsk.
What Avenger disparagingly called 'fireworks', actually looks like a well-packed charge of C-4 with a detonator. Recipient - A Dutier called Kanevsky.
On the handle of this pistol-machine gun there is an engraved inscription. Extremely worn all that can be made out is 'for good ... cl .. bu..' and someone's initials,' A. P.shk.n. '

Old worn weapon, with claw mark's on the butt. The stuff legends are made of. In particular - they say that this particular one slew some of the deadliest beasts that emerged after the recent Zone outbreak.

Judging by their appearance, these arms have been trampled into the ground, and probably in the vicinity of 'agricultural industry'. Factory label on the butt states that it is a shotgun from a limited edition run built using higher quality burnishing.

A weapons for commando's. This weapon was worked on by a technician who knows the business, significantly improving it's combat performance. According to rumors, it was Screw - the legendary craftsman from the Army warehouse's.

Specially developed by scientists. Equipped with radar for anomalous formations and LED display to show the direction of the unknown sample, and is able not only to detect patterns, but also to determine the distance to them. Search mode is accessed by lifting the lid on the front of the device.
Radioactive. The properties of the artifact is practically unknown.

Artifact of organic nature. Consists of a deformed animal tissues. When injected into the area of chemical pollution it begins to 'pull' the chemicals from the air and converts them into a thick viscous mass.
It has been established that the radiation produced by the pulsating and thickening of this item's structure makes the blood in open wounds clot very quickly.

An organic artifact with unique properties. In an unknown manner it increases the overall speed of the bodies ability to regenerate after injuries of any nature, without accelerating the accumulation of toxins.
Artifact of electrostatic nature. Is able to dramatically increase the muscle tone of the carrier.
Generates a directed gravitational field. It effectively reduces the weight of the contents in the wearer's backpack.
An organic artifact. Generates an invisible field around itself, which strengthens the immune system of whoever is within the affected area.
Files folder, a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'top secret' \nS / N 773645
Files folder, a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'top secret' \nS / N 7736112
Files folder, a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'top secret' \nS / N 773618
The key should be used to open the safe containing the access card to the underground laboratory.
A rare book in the area.
A rare book in the area.
A rare book in the area.
PDA with precious information for the leader of the free stalkers - Sword.
Medallion belonging to the brother of Phoenix - Germanicus.
Map showing access route to the X18 lab.
Explosive charge. Comes with remote control.
For the remote detonation of the charge C4 - should be used.
The steel box with a fortune inside.
The key is found near the dead scientist.
Files folder, a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'top secret' \nS / N 7736708
Files folder, a few sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'top secret' \nS / N 7736711
Bandits gate key. Is used to open the gate leading to the Swamps
Explosive charge. Comes with remote control.
For the remote detonation of the charge C4 - it should be used.
Flash drive is to be taken from the body of Tamerlane.
USB Flash Drive with useful information for stalkers.
Bandit's safe key. Used to open the safe.
Army cargo. Furthermore it contains a chemical unknown to me. Need to return it to the SBU.
The most important part of any mine detector.
It can help you locate and neutralize mines hidden under the ground.
With GPR you can find any metallic item even if it were deep underground. Detection range - 30 meters.
Information from the PDA: 'Thank you for the work done, the money can be obtained from our man at the Iron Forest.'
Information from the PDA: 'Five of the charges have been laid at five points where it is possible an agent of the SBU may appear, the money needs to be ready to send.'
An Ordinary portable radio with an FM receiver.
Special kit to neutralize the charge.
Special scanner for DF charges. Search radius - 50 feet.
The drug developed by scientists to control the effects of psi-emissions.
The drug developed by scientists to control the effects of psi-emissions.
PDA of the security guard of the expedition of scientists
Information from the PDA: 'The people I'm here to protect are almost gone. Mutants are attacking all out and in force. Tomorrow we will come back.'
PDA belonging to a member of the expedition
Information from the device: 'The preparation is almost done, it remains to test it. The group that received the drug went into the center of the location for its trials.'

Information from the PDA: 'preparty was applied on a group for protection, The performance surprised us. Everything went perfectly. It's the second product we have invented to reduce the psychic activity of the controller and it was applied to the controller but unfortunately his psycho-activity is not decreased, vice versa infact it increased several times. '
